DataElement.preferredName: University of Washington Quality of Life Questionnaire Past 7 Days Other Most Important Issue Descriptive Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated perception of any other medical or non-medical issues that are important to their quality of life that have not already been mentioned, using a descriptive text field.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: University of Washington Quality of Life Questionnaire Past 7 Days Other Most Important Issue
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire designed to assess health-related quality of life in head and neck cancer patients._The most recent week including today._Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._A question about a person's most important health issues.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Please describe any other iss
ReferenceDocuments.description: Please describe any other issues (medical or nonmedical) that are important to your quality of life and have not been adequately addressed by our questions (you may attach additional sheets if needed).
